Text:
A good collection, all HD (even season 2 which I've found hardest to find in HD). No text on the files either. 

Please seed people so more can enjoy. Also the show is amazing and support it after you watch it.

Dear god.... please seed. There were 4 seeders the other day and now it's back down to 1. Anyway this torrent could be broken up to speed the process a little even. 

I'm just trying to get a decent copy of season 2.
would you like me to upload each season individually?
please seed a little more... so we can get the rest (currently 29.9%) no full episodes within torrent yet.
Im seeding more now :) btw if you prioritise each season by order then you can at least watch one of the seasons before the torrent has finished downloading
thanks. I have season 1 on priority :-)
and also - i appreciate the effort to upload
also thanks for taking the effort to upload

thanks for the kind words, i plan on doing hemlock grove and house of cards soon too! btw the episodes in season 4 will appear as 3 different seasons when you sync them too an ipad 9and presumably an iphone iPod, but i dont have one so im not sure) due to mistagging on my behalf - sorry its easy to fix tho if you just click 'get info' on the whole season and remove artist and album artist :D

It seems like the people from the istole.it tracker aren't sharing with the people from the other trackers, and vice versa, what the hell is going on? I can see it and ping it, but I can't download from it.
i noticed that too... stuck on 30.9% yet full seeds on istole.it
PLEASE SEED! My seedbox is stuck at 30.9%! I will seed up to 4x.
Everybody stuck at 30.9%? I'm about to give up.
will you please reupload? I'm stuck at 30%
yeah sorry my harddrive got corrupted, but I have a backup :) ill reupload each season individually next week or this Friday maybe - sorry again
ETA on reupload? Need to know whether to trash bin this one or not...
Im uploading season 1 2 and 3 today all individually :) just delete this torrent
